sentences.sContent: The Tories are due to publish their manifesto tomorrow.
sentences.sCn: 保守党将于明天发表他们的宣言。

phrases.pCn: 共产党宣言（现代共产主义学说发展史上的第一部经典，由马克思和恩格斯合著）

remMethod.val: mani(手) + fest(打) + o → 用手打， 怒意很明显 → 宣言， 声明

trans.tranOther: a written statement by a political party, saying what they believe in and what they intend to do
